Articles.Content: To be honest, I want the Orange Box. I have HL2 and Portal, but getting the 2 episodes and a TF2 premium account for abour Â£7.50 (I have a 1/2 price Valve voucher) is really tempting... if someone wants Just Cause 2, I\'ll give them a half price voucher and trade the Orange Box for Just Cause 2...
(Should probably have mentioned. 1. I\'m open to other offers. 2. I can trade my vouchers before they go out if you want.)
Ooh, I\'ve heard good things about that game. Unfortunately, I don\'t think I have anything to trade...

Last chance tonight!

GREAT DEAL: You buy me ORANGE BOX at 50% off with MY VOUCHER' date=' and I trade you JUST CAUSE 2, HL2 and some vouchers IN RETURN! (If you already have it and are feeling generous, then I\'ll trade anyway. )[/quote']
